sentences.en: A butterfly is produced by metamorphosis from a caterpillar.
sentences.cn: 蝴蝶是由毛虫脱胎变成的.

sentences.en: A caterpillar is the larva of a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 毛虫是蝴蝶的幼体.

sentences.en: A caterpillar is transformed into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 毛虫变成蝴蝶.

sentences.en: A caterpillar must pass through the cocoon stage to become a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 毛毛虫必须经过茧的阶段才能变成蝴蝶.

sentences.en: A caterpillar transforms into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 毛虫变成了蝴蝶。

sentences.en: A mountain range shown by this method can look like a hairy caterpillar.
sentences.cn: 采用这种方法表示的山脉看上去象一条毛虫.

sentences.en: I saw a caterpillar on the leaf.
sentences.cn: 我看见一条毛毛虫在叶子上。

sentences.en: I think a caterpillar bit me!
sentences.cn: 想来是毛毛虫刺了我一下. ”

sentences.en: In some sense, you could say that the caterpillar dies.
sentences.cn: 从某种意义上来说，你也可以说，毛虫死了。

sentences.en: Nature transforms a caterpillar into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 大自然使毛虫变为蝴蝶.

sentences.en: Peculiarities in the silkworm are known to appear at the corresponding caterpillar or cocoon stage.
sentences.cn: 蚕体的性状,亦限于相当的幼虫期或蛹期出现.

sentences.en: The caterpillar began to run about in circles and then flopped over on its back.
sentences.cn: 毛虫开始乱跳,转了几圈,便扑地摔了个脸朝天.

sentences.en: The caterpillar has metamorphosed into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 蝎已变成蝴蝶.

sentences.en: The caterpillar might well give you nightmares though!
sentences.cn: 但是，它的毛虫却可能引起你噩梦！

sentences.en: The caterpillar turned into butterfly.
sentences.cn: 毛虫变成了蝴蝶.

sentences.en: The caterpillar was transformed into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 毛毛虫变成了蝴蝶.

sentences.en: The caterpillar will eventually metamorphose into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 毛毛虫最终将蜕变成一只蝴蝶。

sentences.en: The caterpillars grow. This caterpillar is big and fat.
sentences.cn: 这毛虫渐渐成长。这个毛虫是大的和肥的。

sentences.en: The caterpillars grow.This caterpillar is big and fat.
sentences.cn: 这毛虫渐渐成长.这个毛虫是大的和肥的。

sentences.en: the metamorphosis of a caterpillar into a butterfly
sentences.cn: 从毛毛虫到蝴蝶的蜕变

trans.tran_en: a small creature like a  worm  with many legs that eats leaves and that develops into a  butterfly  or other flying insect
